articles.author: Costas Mourselas
articles.title: Share price surge helps largest hedge funds to biggest profits on record - Financial Times
articles.description: Best-performing managers’ punchy bets on stock markets paid off in 2023
articles.content:
The worlds most successful hedge funds made their biggest profits on record last year as punchy bets on stock markets paid off when share prices surged.
The top 20 managers made profits for investor… [+3394 chars]
